INTERSHOP IOM 4.2.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision a818edecfb5448bab309af2e95340f04c6ae9624)

Table oms.PlatformConfigPropertyDO

Additional ptaform wide copmnfigurations managed also managed within the java cache "bakery-cache-config"

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id integer PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL nextval('"PlatformConfigPropertyDO_id_seq"')  
PlatformConfigDO platformConfigRef smallint NOT_NULL 1 Required to bind the properties into PlatformConfigDO. Do not modify. 
key text UNIQUE, NOT_NULL Property name, must be uniqued 
value text NOT_NULL Property value. 
validate text Optional regular expression to validate the property value. 
description text Optional text description. 

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.

Constraints and Indexes 

Type Name Definition
PRIMARY KEY PlatformConfigPropertyDO_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) 
CHECK CONSTRAINT PlatformConfigPropertyDO_ck1 CHECK ("platformConfigRef" = 1) 
CHECK CONSTRAINT PlatformConfigPropertyDO_ck2 CHECK (validate IS NULL OR value ~ validate) 
UNIQUE CONSTRAINT PlatformConfigPropertyDO_uk UNIQUE (key) 
FOREIGN KEY PlatformConfigPropertyDO_fk FOREIGN KEY ("platformConfigRef") REFERENCES "PlatformConfigDO"(id)
